refnamediv.refpurpose: Returns an init-type equivalent of a k-rate argument, or directly returns an i-rate argument.

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns an init-type equivalent of a k-rate argument, or directly returns an i-rate argument.

refsect1.title: Syntax
refsect1.para:
Value converters perform arithmetic translation from units of one kind to units of another. The result can then be a term in a further expression.
Note
Using i() with a k-rate expression argument is not recommended, and can produce unexpected results.
